forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies during the evening with areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
